function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Selection bias in the population","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of target population, leading to biased results","Mitigation":"Implement randomization and stratification techniques, and ensure thorough data collection","Technologies":"Randomization software and data collection tools","People":"Research participants, data collectors, and data analysts","Owner":"Research team and data analysts"},{"Description":"Inclusion bias in the selection of individuals providing data","Impact":"Biased analysis and interpretation of results","Mitigation":"Conduct sensitivity analyses and use statistical correction methods for bias","Technologies":"Statistical correction software and sensitivity analysis tools","People":"Data analysts and statisticians","Owner":"Data analysts and research team"},{"Description":"Derivation of green space variable not well described","Impact":"Unclear understanding of the green space measure, leading to potential inaccuracies","Mitigation":"Provide detailed documentation of green space variable derivation methods and validation process","Technologies":"Documentation tools and validation software","People":"Research team and data analysts","Owner":"Research team"}]}
